periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 79. Southeast wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. East wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before noon, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between noon and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 3pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 83. East wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
